20101224021451.000|20101224021454.000|TR0|something that, you know, obviously 
20101224021454.000|20101224021458.000|TR0|growing up in Detroit you'd hear the 
20101224021458.000|20101224021501.000|TR0|different harmonica players, come and 
20101224021501.000|20101224021505.000|TR0|playing the blues and walking down on the 
20101224021505.000|20101224021508.000|TR0|streets.  When I was off for the Christmas 
20101224021508.000|20101224021512.000|TR0|holiday season, an uncle gave me a 
20101224021512.000|20101224021515.000|TR0|harmonica -- chromatic harmonica.  And 
20101224021515.000|20101224021519.000|TR0|obviously I didn't know what to do with

20101224021536.000|20101224021540.000|TR0|me.  And so it was like --
20101224021540.000|20101224021543.000|TR0|
20101224021543.000|20101224021547.000|TR0|KING:  You take to music, you're called a 
20101224021547.000|20101224021550.000|TR0|genius.  Did that bother you being called 
20101224021550.000|20101224021554.000|TR0|a genius so young?
20101224021554.000|20101224021557.000|TR0|
20101224021557.000|20101224021601.000|TR0|WONDER:  The amazing thing about being 
20101224021601.000|20101224021604.000|TR0|called a genius is, I never paid any 
20101224021604.000|20101224021608.000|TR0|attention to it.  I mean I appreciated it 
20101224021608.000|20101224021611.000|TR0|but I -- I think since the very early age 
20101224021611.000|20101224021615.000|TR0|I felt like this here is a gift from God

20101224023127.000|20101224023131.000|TR0|came from really the spirit of, you know, 
20101224023131.000|20101224023134.000|TR0|how love is something that's for all 
20101224023134.000|20101224023138.000|TR0|seasons, whether there'd be a holiday or 
20101224023138.000|20101224023141.000|TR0|not a holiday or just being able to 
20101224023141.000|20101224023145.000|TR0|express that place any time, love is

20101224023155.000|20101224023159.000|TR0|just called to say I love you, I just 
20101224023159.000|20101224023202.000|TR0|called to say how much I care.

20101224023209.000|20101224023213.000|TR0|away, too?

20101224023216.000|20101224023220.000|TR0|WONDER:  Well, the lyric for that came 
20101224023220.000|20101224023223.000|TR0|from me having some words already and then 
20101224023223.000|20101224023227.000|TR0|putting them together in a way that worked 
20101224023227.000|20101224023230.000|TR0|good for the film and equally as important
